channel.title: D&D on Den of devils
channel.description: Recent content in D&D on Den of devils

item.title: The World / The star
item.description: The World Meet Drazkise, a character for a D&D campaign based on magical girls and Super Sentai. His «superhero» outfit is inspired by the World tarot card. Made with Procreate. The Star This one is Memoru, my backup for the same campaign that doubles as Drazkise’s roommate. His magical boy outfit is inspired by the Star tarot card. Much like the previous piece, this was made with Procreate.
